Generate and Construct All PTMs Network

GenerateAndConstructAllptmsNetwork.Rd

This function generates and constructs the PTMs network from given data lists and tables.

Usage

GenerateAndConstructAllptmsNetwork(
  eu.allptms.list,
  sp.allptms.list,
  sed.allptms.list,
  ptmtable.df,
  keeplength = 2,
  output_dir = "plots"
)

Arguments

eu.allptms.list

A list containing all PTMs data for the European dataset.

sp.allptms.list

A list containing all PTMs data for the SP dataset.

sed.allptms.list

A list containing all PTMs data for the SED dataset.

ptmtable.df

A data frame containing all PTMs data.

keeplength

An integer specifying the minimum length of common elements to keep. Default is 2.

output_dir

A string specifying the output directory for saving plots. Default is "plots".

Value

A list containing the updated ptmtable.df and data for eu.sp.sed.allptms.

Examples

GenerateAndConstructAllptmsNetwork(eu.allptms.list, sp.allptms.list, sed.allptms.list, ptmtable.df)
#> Error in plyr::ldply(eu.allptms.list): object 'eu.allptms.list' not found
